entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Waskaganish
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:36 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -5.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Waskaganish Airport 1:00 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022
Temperature: -5.6°C
Pressure: 98.5 kPa
Humidity: 84 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -7.8°C
Wind: NW 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Snow and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill minus 17 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Light snow. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Light snow ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Local blowing snow. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 16. Wind chill near minus 29. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022
